overview: Sun rises as always, but no one can watch it in the same way! Just as we generalize a nation's leaders' military decisions to its entire population, shouldn't it be time to generalize to our species the terrible destruction the foremost offenders have wrought on this planet? Artists, athletes, sports teams, and even literature from one of the world's largest countries have been sanctioned and boycotted because of their political leadership. Isn't it fair to punish the most powerful species as well?
title: 2132 People are Watching
